website_summaries.verdict: Though it feels too similar to last year's G3, the LG G4 is an excellent big-screen smartphone that will appeal to budding photographers, and has old-school features missing from rival flagships.
pros: The LG G4 has a sharp and generously sized display, a bevy of camera controls and raw image shooting, a replaceable battery and expandable storage
cons: Though the phone's battery life is adequate, it doesn't last as long as its competitors
There are no significant new software features and its design feels uninspired

customer_reviews.title: I'm completely disappointed. I once gave it a review of 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone from October 2015 and it suddenly crashed and permanently stopped working a month ago. I'm completely disappointed. I once gave it a review of 5 stars but I have to take it back. The phone is now completely useless No warning what so ever, just crashed. I took it to be looked at and they concluded that the phone has a hardware problem. I contacted Amazon and LG with no help what so ever from either party. I'm done with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy This Phone!!! Before purchasing this LG G4 H815 phone, please check the model number/manufacture date. If it was manufactured before September 2015, like mine was you will run into a lot of problems with the item. The models manufactured before September 2015 were recalled due to having several manufacturers defects. I experienced the split screen, where half of the screen becomes unusable with static like lines that you used to see when a tv station was signed off at the end of the night. It is very frustrating. I am in the process of sorting this situation out with Amazon, as the fault is not mine. They sold a defective phone!
customer_reviews.author: N. Blackman

customer_reviews.title: almost the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift in January. Phone was fantastic for the price; the camera was top notch, and the OS was smooth. It was literally idiot proof. Then one day, the phone shut down; it wouldn't connect to the computer, it wouldn't charge...it just died. Now, I use it as a paperweight because LG has taken for frigging ever to respond, and when they do, they give silly suggestions like change the battery, when we all know it's more than that. So initially, a 5/5, now a -50/5, mostly because it's so light that it doesn't do it's secondary function as a paperweight well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Camille

customer_reviews.title: Fools Gold!
customer_reviews.text: Do not EVER buy this phone! It has both design and manufacturing issues and prone to infant mortality. The issues are hardware related and surfaces roughly around 12 - 16 months of usage. The Warranty is void by that time and you are just left with a bricked phone. Does not boot at all and CANNOT be fixed via SW. Even the replacement given by LG has issues with one of the BGA components and the battery lasts for only 3-4 hours!
customer_reviews.author: HypersonicAviator

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with best cell phone camera
customer_reviews.text: Update: 11/18/16. It is now stuck on LG logo screen. I called LG and no warranty since it is international version. Don't buy international version otherwise even if it is manufacturers defect, it is not covered! $400 range, I chose this phone. What made the decision for me is the camera. Very im6pressive camera with manual control which means you can shoot like DSLR. The other options were the Nexus 6 or Moto X pure.
customer_reviews.author: Tirso Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Inherent company mechanical design failure.
customer_reviews.text: LG G4 failed? Weird, it was my favorite phone! Stylish, comfortable in hand with its ergonomically curved real leather back! Sound was good, I liked it over the comparable Galaxy phones. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome until it dies
customer_reviews.text: I adored everything about the phone. Until it got caught in a bootup loop and then died just 4 months after purchase. And apparently they'll only repair it if under warranty even though they've acknowledged this manufacturing error
customer_reviews.author: Nes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, incredible camera, removable battery and micro sd card.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to replace my aging galaxy s3, and i love it. Amazing screen, brilliant colors, incredible resolution. The fact that it has a replaceable battery and not an internal one, along with expandable memory using and external micro sd card is huge to me. Most comparable phones do not offer that any more, and thats a deal breaker for me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: lasermax

customer_reviews.title: It is a good phone but with no guarantees
customer_reviews.text: It is a good phone but with no guarantees. If anything happened to it, neither the US nor the UK LG can help you. It ships from Taiwan. Mine was working perfectly for 6 months then its motherboard needed repair. LG refused to repair it because it's from Taiwan. So I had to get a new phone from a reliable US seller. I used to like the phone, but I learned a lesson. NEVER BUY PHONES FROM AMAZON. The phone itself is amazing. I loved it. I recommend you to buy it from a guaranteed seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Until it Dies from Boot Loop
customer_reviews.text: As said by many others, it's a great phone until it stops working. It has a manufacturer's defect commonly called the Boot Loop problem due to faulty solder joints. Mine lasted 1.5 years which seems pretty good for this phone but now it will no longer turn on and many other phones last far longer. It's super frustrating that Amazon nor LG will offer any kind of replacement program for the international unlocked version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Android experience I've ever had. Rarely ever miss my iPhone 6 Plus.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this phone. Best phone experience I've had outside of the ease of the Appstore and OS from Apple. Camera literally blows me away. Love this phone. Brown leather back gives real premium look. Arrived on time. Works great. Cricket service is perfect on this.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE! I made a huge mistake buying this ...
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE! I made a huge mistake buying this phone and trusting LG. In less than a year the phone got into boot loop and LG assistance said the mother board must be replaced...so the phone is basically rubbish. My best friend's LG G4 instead, bought in Italy from a shop switched off and LG had to replace it. In both of our cases(you can check it online) the issue was well known from the LG community. Concluding... DO NOT BUY LG PHONES!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PHONE WILL DIE AFTER SIX MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: YOUR PHONE WILL DIE AFTER SIX MONTHS!! I bought this phone in December 2015 and it died on me in July 2016. It got caught in a "boot loop mode". Internet research shows this problem is endemic with the lg g4s. LG knows about the problem but doesnt care. With this model, you get no US warranty. I was SCREWED out of $399 because of this scam of a phone. I now own a samsung s6 and am happy with it. FRIENDS DON'T LET FRIENDS BUT FAULTY LG PRODUCTS LIKE THIS!

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend! Bad product Bad Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This cellphone is bad , not recommended !!! After 10 months of the purchase the phone stuck in boot loop .you can't even backup your data. LG admitted that it's an issue in manufacturing of the device but continues to market it As well as the problem may come back again after the fix. the Amazon store I purchased the device from replied laconically : Unfortunately since the returns / replacements period for your order has expired, there is nothing I can do. that is very BAD LG.. you should recall the product and compensate the consumers immediately

I would definitely recommend this phone to anyone..

Selling this type of phone with problems a d no warranty is a scam lg is making. I can't belive it. Very dissapointed ...update dec2016,...after a few months of having the bootloop, now the phone is completly dead, please sing a petiton on change.org to make LG do something about it, we are close to reach 15 000 with the same issue [...]

customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Tillapaugh

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice phone, but it's no iPhone
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice phone, but it's no iPhone.. It's crashing sometimes or get stuck, but overall i like it. The camera is AMAZING which makes all the rest worthwhile. Abd the seller was great. The shipment was fast and i got exactly what i ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Anat Tainovich

customer_reviews.title: Boot locked, Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Phone doesn't work, stuck on LG logo. DO NOT BUY, Battery life is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Dalit Levy

customer_reviews.title: bad seller!
customer_reviews.text: bad seller!! period!! this phone does not work anymore. Do not buy from this people!! These Phones can't get serviced in US!!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I got probably a faulty unit. Returned it but didn't get any feedback what was wrong
customer_reviews.author: Herve Amsili

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the phone is really great. The camera is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, I got this phone from MEGA MOBILE retailers and DID NOT RECEIVE the UK UNLOCKED version which is the 815. I RECEIVED the 815T which is the HONG KONG VERSION. This DOES NOT SUPPORT LTE B2 for T-Mobile which I was expecting as stated on this page. Other than that the phone is really great. The camera is amazing. Just be aware of which unlocked version you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: kedar kulkarni

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone until the Boot Loop!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the phone until I got the boot screen death and ......I did some online research and found out that this problem is quite common with the LG G4. It is a manufacturers DEFECT (commonly referred to a BOOT LOOP) Now WHAT? Just loose all my stuff and out hundreds of $$ since no warranty? LG What can you do to help your customers, I would try another phone if LG helped deal with this issue. I had a LG g3 which was great but the wifi died on the phone. How many times until you help your customers LG?
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year now. Love it. Everything works well, problems would be typical android problems, eg suddenly nothing downloads, can't update, but seems it's a Microsoft's issue. Very clear photos, although the file size far too large even on smallest setting. Difficulty in the dark, as with most cameras. I don't find the flash strong enough. My laptop has trouble recognizing what's stored in the phone's internal storage or SD chip when cord plugged in, thank goodness the mini SD chip is removable although transferring pictures becomes tedious. Leather very nice on the hand and surprisingly strong, no scratch yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kay L.

customer_reviews.title: NOPE!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I would love to say that this phone has been awesome for me. It has...up until today. Today, the phone died inexplicably while I was listening to Mike and Mike. It would not come back on despite all of my attempts at troubleshooting and when I called LG customer support, they could not even verify that this phone was manufactured by them...WHAT!!? Now, I am stuck trying to figure out what amounts to a beautiful brick that may or may not have been manufactured by the company that I believed it to be manufactured by....so....stay away!!! PLEASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clark
